column1: I will donate $1 for every upvote I get, but I will subtract -$1 for every comment this post gets. Go for it.
Edge lord, sucks dick for weed, basically a Nazi. Destroy my friend.

Do your worst assholes. Haven't had a good cry in a while
21, failing business school, roast me harder than life already did
I took the same picture 30 times and i downloaded reddit just so I could be roasted. Don't let me down guys.
Too socially awkward to interact with the real world. Give me another reason to cry
Soulless calculus nerd, bring it on
Just got out of prison, roast me!
